sentences.sContent: ‘How long will she be ill?’ he asked. There was an ominous silence.
sentences.sCn: “她的病多久会好？”他问。大家的沉默让人感觉不妙。

sentences.sContent: The car is making an ominous rattling sound.
sentences.sCn: 汽车在发出一种不妙的咔嗒声。

remMethod.val: omin (看作omen， 预兆的) + ous → 预兆的

trans.tranCn: 预兆的； 不祥的， 不吉的
trans.tranOther: making you feel that something bad is going to happen
